name: Prototype Multiplayer RPG
description:
A prototype I'm currently working on for a local multiplayer rpg.

You can use abilities as long as you have enough AP (action points, second bar). Press the button corresponding to the menu you want to use.

You can use either up to 3 controllers or the keyboard to control (ZQSD for Up/Left/Down/Right ; OKLM for YXAB, it makes sense on an AZERTY keyboard)

This is not finished yet, but is the first playable version.
